hooks.name: git-branch-info
hooks.description: Show current git branch info on each command
hooks.prompt: 执行: cd {{.rootDir}} && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "not a git repo"

hooks.name: commit-msg-check
hooks.prompt: 检查 commit message 是否符合规范（推荐包含 co-authored-by）

hooks.name: project-info
hooks.prompt: 执行以下命令获取项目信息: cd {{.rootDir}} && echo "=== Project Info ===" && [ -f package.json ] && cat package.json | grep -E '"(name|version)"' | head -2; [ -f Cargo.toml ] && cat Cargo.toml | grep -E '^name|^version' | head -2; [ -f pyproject.toml ] && cat pyproject.toml | grep -E '^name|^version' | head -2; echo "=== Git Status ===" && git status --short 2>/dev/null | head -5
